attributes.comment:
I am writing to request that Immigration and Naturalization Benefit Application
and Petition Fee Schedule not be increased. It is already very expensive for
parents to adopt internationally and raising the fee would only make it more
difficult for middle income families to adopt. Just as we, as adoptive parents,
feel that our family would not be complete without international adoption, there
are children in the world who are not complete without a family. Raising the
fee would make it harder for these children and parents to become a family.
Please take my comments into account when making this decision.

Thank you,
Stacie Dixon

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Stacie Dixon
